content.raw:
Ah, I didn't see the contacts.clear() the first time I looked at your changes. Yes this resolves (ii). There's a few concerns with the implementation but adding those to the pull request is the better way to address those I guess.
I think (i) might still persist (actually it might have gotten worse using the fix for (ii) ) but I'm not able to test it as the functions triggering those error messages are only called via the ros bumper plugin I think which still needs to be ported to 1.2.

I'll close the ticket for now as (ii) has been addressed and (i) can't be tested properly until the bumper plugin has been ported to 1.2.
content.html:
Ah, I didn't see the contacts.clear() the first time I looked at your changes. Yes this resolves (ii). There's a few concerns with the implementation but adding those to the pull request is the better way to address those I guess. I think (i) might still persist (actually it might have gotten worse using the fix for (ii) ) but I'm not able to test it as the functions triggering those error messages are only called via the ros bumper plugin I think which still needs to be ported to 1.2.

I'll close the ticket for now as (ii) has been addressed and (i) can't be tested properly until the bumper plugin has been ported to 1.2.
